TextBlock.Text: NESIA: That should be the last of the circuitry in place. Is the warp core prepared?
OKALIS: Yes it is, although this seems to be the only functional black hole core left in the <color=orange>Vessel</color>.
NESIA: Okay then, go ahead and slot it into place and we will see if this somehow works.
NESIA: Wait, how did that work? It should be completely impossible for that to function!
OKALIS: Yes! I told you it was worth attempting!
SENNETTI: That means we can escape! I can not wait to reunite with the rest of our clan, I had started to worry that we would never see them again.
AZOLLA: Let us not delay then, there is no telling how long that core will be able to hold the singularity open. Everyone, go through!
